item.title: Stay Strong 101: Madonna
item.description: “It’s the summer of 2005, all the windows of our house were open (even if we’d be moved to next year) … As a gentle wind wanders through the rooms, that rhythm would never leave my mind, echoes in my ears: … Time goes by so slowly I don’t know what to do” Well, it’s really interesting to find that song playing on the radio and the artist who was singing, but maybe I’ll tell you next time.
